card.name: AEthermage's Touch
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Anthem of Rakdos
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn and Anthem of Rakdos deals 1 damage to you. Hellbent - As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

card.name: Aquastrand Spider
card.text: Graft 2 {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Assault Zeppelid
card.text: Flying, trample

card.name: Aurora Eidolon
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice Aurora Eidolon: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Aurora Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Avatar of Discord
card.text: Flying When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

card.name: Azorius AEthermage
card.text: Whenever a permanent is returned to your hand, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.text: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Azorius First-Wing
card.text: Flying, protection from enchantments

card.name: Azorius Guildmage
card.text: {2}{W}: Tap target creature. {2}{U}: Counter target activated ability.

card.name: Azorius Herald
card.text: Azorius Herald can't be blocked. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Azorius Ploy
card.text: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Azorius Signet
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Beacon Hawk
card.text: Flying Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature. {W}: Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Biomantic Mastery
card.text: Draw a card for each creature target player controls, then draw a card for each creature another target player controls.

card.name: Blessing of the Nephilim
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.text: As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Blood Crypt enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bond of Agony
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Bond of Agony, pay X life. Each other player loses X life.

card.name: Bound // Determined
card.text: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card. // Other spells you control can't be countered by spells or abilities this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Brace for Impact
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target multicolored creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Brain Pry
card.text: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand. That player discards a card with that name. If he or she can't, you draw a card.

card.name: Breeding Pool
card.text: As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bronze Bombshell
card.text: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to him or her.

card.name: Cackling Flames
card.text: Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Hellbent - Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Carom
card.text: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead. Draw a card.

card.name: Celestial Ancient
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Court Hussar
card.text: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Crime // Punishment
Crypt Champion
card.text: Double strike When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield. When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Cytoplast Manipulator
card.text: Graft 2 {U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it for as long as Cytoplast Manipulator remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
card.text: Graft 4 When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control that has a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

card.name: Cytoshape
card.text: Choose a nonlegendary creature on the battlefield. Target creature becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Cytospawn Shambler
card.text: Graft 6 {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Delirium Skeins
card.text: Each player discards three cards.

card.name: Demonfire
card.text: Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Demon's Jester
card.text: Flying Hellbent - Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Dovescape
card.text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player puts X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Dread Slag
card.text: Trample Dread Slag gets -4/-4 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Drekavac
card.text: When Drekavac enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a noncreature card.

card.name: Elemental Resonance
card.text: Enchant permanent At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add mana equal to enchanted permanent's mana cost to your mana pool.

card.name: Enemy of the Guildpact
card.text: Protection from multicolored

card.name: Enigma Eidolon
card.text: {U}, Sacrifice Enigma Eidolon: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Enigma Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Entropic Eidolon
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice Entropic Eidolon: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Entropic Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Evolution Vat
card.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Until end of turn, that creature gains "{2}{G}{U}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature."

card.name: Experiment Kraj
card.text: Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Fertile Imagination
card.text: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield for each card of the chosen type revealed this way.

card.name: Flame-Kin War Scout
card.text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Flame-Kin War Scout. If you do, Flame-Kin War Scout deals 4 damage to that creature.

card.name: Flaring Flame-Kin
card.text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Flash Foliage
card.text: Cast Flash Foliage only during combat after blockers are declared. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield blocking target creature attacking you. Draw a card.

card.name: Freewind Equenaut
card.text: Flying As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."

card.name: Ghost Quarter
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Gnat Alley Creeper
card.text: Gnat Alley Creeper can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

card.name: Gobhobbler Rats
card.text: Hellbent - As long as you have no cards in hand, Gobhobbler Rats gets +1/+0 and has "{B}: Regenerate Gobhobbler Rats."

card.name: Govern the Guildless
card.text: Gain control of target monocolored creature. Forecast - {1}{U}, Reveal Govern the Guildless from your hand: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
card.text: White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Guardian of the Guildpact
card.text: Protection from monocolored

card.name: Haazda Exonerator
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.

card.name: Haazda Shield Mate
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Haazda Shield Mate unless you pay {W}{W}. {W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Hallowed Fountain
card.text: As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Helium Squirter
card.text: Graft 3 {1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Hellhole Rats
card.text: Haste When Hellhole Rats enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Hellhole Rats deals damage to that player equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Hide // Seek
Hit // Run
Ignorant Bliss
card.text: Exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Indrik Stomphowler
card.text: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Infernal Tutor
card.text: Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Isperia the Inscrutable
card.text: Flying Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, name a card. That player reveals his or her hand. If he or she reveals the named card, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Jagged Poppet
card.text: Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards. Hellbent - Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.

card.name: Kill-Suit Cultist
card.text: Kill-Suit Cultist attacks each turn if able. {B}, Sacrifice Kill-Suit Cultist: The next time damage would be dealt to target creature this turn, destroy that creature instead.

card.name: Kindle the Carnage
card.text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.

card.name: Leafdrake Roost
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{G}{U}, {T}: Put a 2/2 green and blue Drake creature token with flying onto the battlefield."

card.name: Loaming Shaman
card.text: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to target creature or player if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

card.name: Macabre Waltz
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.

card.text: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.

card.name: Might of the Nephilim
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each of its colors.

card.name: Minister of Impediments
card.text: {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
card.text: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Muse Vessel
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}: Choose a card exiled with Muse Vessel. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Nettling Curse
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life. {1}{R}: Enchanted creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Nightcreep
card.text: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.

card.name: Nihilistic Glee
card.text: {2}{B}, Discard a card: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Hellbent - {1}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

card.text: Graft 4 {1}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Draw a card.

card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

card.name: Pain Magnification
card.text: Whenever an opponent is dealt 3 or more damage by a single source, that player discards a card.

card.name: Paladin of Prahv
card.text: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life. Forecast - {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Palliation Accord
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a shield counter on Palliation Accord. Remove a shield counter from Palliation Accord: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Patagia Viper

card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.

card.name: Plaxmanta

card.name: Plumes of Peace

card.name: Pride of the Clouds
card.text: Flying Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield. Forecast - {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Put a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Proclamation of Rebirth
card.text: Return up to three target creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Forecast - {5}{W}, Reveal Proclamation of Rebirth from your hand: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Proper Burial
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Target multicolored creature gains double strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

Ragamuffyn

card.name: Rain of Gore

card.name: Rakdos Augermage
card.text: First strike {T}: Reveal your hand and discard a card of target opponent's choice. Then that player reveals his or her hand and discards a card of your choice. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.text: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Rakdos Ickspitter
card.text: {T}: Rakdos Ickspitter deals 1 damage to target creature and that creature's controller loses 1 life.

card.text: {R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent - Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

Rakdos Signet
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

card.text: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wit's End
card.text: Target player discards his or her hand.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.text: Destroy target creature or land.

card.name: Writ of Passage
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, if its power is 2 or less, it can't be blocked this turn. Forecast - {1}{U}, Reveal Writ of Passage from your hand: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
